title: FT/FS T210's with a Series 3 Orange Border New Cards Added
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: FT/FS T210's with a Series 3 Orange Border New Cards Added
posts.post_content:
Hello.Im looking to trade or sell these three T210's.The back scans are available upon request.The OB Nagel is now raw but I have the flip if you want to have it reholder.I have available:

T210-2 Decker SGC 40 45.00
T210-2 Peterson SGC 50 SOLD
T210-3 Nagel Orange Border 135.00 or another similar condition OB
T210-8 Vinson SGC 20 90.00
I also have a few graded and raw T210-3 Im willing to part with.Message me if you have wants in this Series and we will work a fair deal for both parties.
Please contact me however is easiest for you.Thank you.
Always interested in trades for cards I don't have and you don't want!
